data.text: Point is, we have no idea what the fuck is going on with Batfleck and anything is possible. But we can't jump to conclusions yet.
...then Casey says he made it up. I don't know if he did make it up, or if he was backtracking, or if he has no idea what's going on at all.
The interview is very awkward. Casey says he doesn't think Ben will do Batman, then the interviewer calls the statement "breaking news"...
